mapper.select: select ht_no as "ht_no", ht_hash as "ht_hash", ht_cnt as "ht_cnt" from hash_table
select ht_no as "ht_no", ht_hash as "ht_hash", ht_cnt as "ht_cnt" from hash_table where ht_hash=#{ht_hash}
mapper.insert:
select seq_ht_no.nextval from dual
insert into hash_table(ht_no, ht_hash) values(#{ht_no},#{ht_hash})
